name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellants, v. Richard W. HENRY, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellants, v. Richard W. HENRY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph S. Rengert, Rosalyn K. Robinson, John P. Krill, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Jeffrey F. Bahls, Quakertown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
517 A.2d 537
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellants, v. Richard W. HENRY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 14, 1986.
Decided Nov. 17, 1986.
Joseph S. Rengert, Rosalyn K. Robinson, John P. Krill, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Jeffrey F. Bahls, Quakertown, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
